fields.description: The unique identifier for the Cloud PC.
fields.name: CloudPCId

fields.description: The date and time at which the snapshot was taken. The timestamp is shown in ISO 8601 format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: CreatedDateTime

fields.description: The date and time when the snapshot expires. The time is shown in ISO 8601 format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: ExpirationDateTime

fields.description: The date and time at which the snapshot was last used to restore the Cloud PC device. The timestamp is shown in ISO 8601 format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: LastRestoredDateTime

fields.description: The type of snapshot that indicates how to create the snapshot. Possible values are automatic, manual. Default value is automatic.
fields.name: SnapshotType

fields.description: The status of the Cloud PC snapshot. The possible values are: ready, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: Status
